downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 2013 White Paper: Microsoft Dynamics GP Companion Application Services Configurator
downloadDescription: This paper describes how to configure the Microsoft Dynamics GP environment for using Microsoft Dynamics GP companion apps.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics GP Companion Application Services Configurator White Paper.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/0/1/f017fb01-cfb7-4be5-8431-efa5442959f7/Microsoft Dynamics GP Companion Application Services Configurator White Paper.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper provides instructions for installing and configuring the Microsoft Dynamics GP Companion Application Services. This white paper also provides information about how a Microsoft Dynamics GP environment must be set up so that your company can use Microsoft Dynamics GP companion apps for tablet and PC devices.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics GP Companion Application Services Configurator White Paper.pdf
systemRequirementsSection: To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manual in PDF file format.
  2. Repeat these steps on each computer where you want to install the file, or save the file to a shared folder where other others can access it.
